mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report(course_ID, project_name, student_ID, report_name, score,submit_time, correct_time) VALUES (#{course_ID}, #{project_name},#{student_ID}, #{report_name},#{score},#{submit_time},#{correct_time})
mapper.select: SELECT project_name,AVG(score) as avg_score,MAX(score) as max_score,MIN(score) as min_score FROM report WHERE course_ID = #{course_ID} GROUP BY project_name
